strokes.description: Sharp intersecting lines creating a frenetic web of energy, mirroring the existing angular pattern
Quick diagonal slashes that cut across the composition, adding to the sense of disorder
Angular zigzag pattern that creates tension and dynamic movement

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The existing image shows a complex network of intersecting lines that suggests underlying tension and disorder. By choosing a chaotic mood and using quick, sharp pen strokes, I'm amplifying this sense of nervous energy and controlled chaos. The fast drawing speed (t=1) and angular movements reinforce the feeling of instability and dynamic tension, while the precise pen tool maintains the clean, geometric quality of the original composition.
